about_the_game:
It rises from the rust-colored sands: an ancient Outpost unlike any in the wasteland, shimmering against the desert sun...

Featuring designs and architecture inspired by ancient Egypt, Meet Your Maker’s Scorched Necropolis Collection combines myth and machine to create post-apocalyptic tombs where gilded Raiders can find either glory – or their final resting place.

The Scorched Necropolis Collection contains:

1 Deco Pack:


    2 Blocks (each available in 3 shapes)
  • Limestone
  • Golden Age
    Use these sand-word slabs to build as they did in ancient times.

    2 Props
  • Winged Molding
  • Temple Light
    Add to your Outpost’s atmosphere with arcane patterns and ominous lighting.

    1 Animated Prop
  • Spinning Enigma
    Strategically place this mysterious spinning symbol to sow dread or distract Raiders.

    8 Decals
    Inscribe the halls of your Outpost with designs inspired by Egyptian hieroglyphs.

    1 Weapon Skin

  • Sunclaw
    A skin that turns the Fury’s Edge into a golden blade, inspired by the Egyptian khopesh.

    2 Custodian Skins

  • Desert Cyclops
  • Gilded Warrior
    Skins that adorn Ironside and Kamaitachi with ornate golden features worthy of the Gods.

*All items in Meet Your Maker can be mixed and matched freely when building an Outpost or creating a Raider loadout.

Featuring designs and architecture inspired by ancient Egypt, Meet Your Maker’s Scorched Necropolis Collection combines myth and machine to create post-apocalyptic tombs where gilded Raiders can find either glory – or their final resting place.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core I5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (2 GB) or Radeon R9 270X (2 GB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core I7-4770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) or Radeon RX 580 (8 GB)

short_description: Meet Your Maker’s Scorched Necropolis Collection invites players to build and raid Outposts worthy of the Pharaohs themselves. Use ancient-Egyptian-inspired blocks, props, weapons, and Custodian Suits to create and infiltrate monumental tombs unlike any in the wasteland.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
